definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Uh-oh, another goldfish bit the dust-how do we break it to the kids?
sentences.chinese: 噢，又一條金魚嚥氣了，我們該怎樣對孩子們解釋呢？

sentences.english: Out of the eight men who fell in the fight , only three still breathed .
sentences.chinese: 這場戰鬥中倒下的八個人中有三個還沒嚥氣。

sentences.english: The famous actress breathed her last.
sentences.chinese: 那位著名的女影星嚥氣了。

sentences.english: It was too late for Teng De. With his last breath, he told his cousin to pass his wages to his mother.
sentences.chinese: 直到騰德快嚥氣時，仍囑咐堂弟把他的工錢交給母親。

sentences.english: Chewing on wood, can progress to the more serious condition of cribbing and wind sucking.
sentences.chinese: 啃木頭的行爲可能發展成更嚴重的咬槽癖和嚥氣癖。

sentences.english: How long do you think it will take him to die, Tom?
sentences.chinese: 你看他還得拖上多久才能嚥氣，湯姆？

sentences.english: I am determined to continue fighting for freedom, until the end of my days.
sentences.chinese: 我決心繼續爲爭取自由而奮鬥，直到嚥氣的一刻爲止。

sentences.english: I will continue fighting for freedom until the end of my days.
sentences.chinese: 我決心繼續爲爭取自由而奮鬥，直到嚥氣的一刻爲止。

sentences.english: Old Jack was over 90 when he snuffed it.
sentences.chinese: 老傑克嚥氣的時候已經90多歲了。

sentences.english: I heard later that it took him half an hour to die.
sentences.chinese: 後來我聽說又過了半個小時它纔算嚥氣。

sentences.english: I waited a long time for him to die, but his breathing did not weaken.
sentences.chinese: 我等着它嚥氣，等了很久，但它的呼吸並不見減弱。

sentences.english: He went into the room and stayed with her until she died.
sentences.chinese: 他跑進屋裏，陪伴着她，直到她嚥氣。
